// Pivot 0, 0
int flipper[30] = {
	85, 9,
	82, 16,
	79, 20,
	74, 24,
	68, 28,
	11, 49,
	7, 49,
	8, 46,
	13, 42,
	25, 31,
	51, 12,
	68, 2,
	77, 0,
	83, 2,
	85, 6
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipper[30] = {
	0.850000f, 0.180000f,
	0.820000f, 0.320000f,
	0.790000f, 0.400000f,
	0.740000f, 0.480000f,
	0.680000f, 0.560000f,
	0.110000f, 0.980000f,
	0.070000f, 0.980000f,
	0.080000f, 0.920000f,
	0.130000f, 0.840000f,
	0.250000f, 0.620000f,
	0.510000f, 0.240000f,
	0.680000f, 0.040000f,
	0.770000f, 0.000000f,
	0.830000f, 0.040000f,
	0.850000f, 0.120000f
};
